articles.title: Remember this … Proteas' batting is as raw as it is wretched | Sport - News24
articles.description: The sheer greenness of South Africa’s batting line-up was brutally exposed once again by England on Saturday, writes Rob Houwing
articles.content:
Sport24 chief writer
An almost incidental statistical achievement by tailender Keshav Maharaj said much about South Africa’s ongoing, frankly humiliating Test batting problems on Saturday.
